plot outline: A young boy falls in love with the daughter of an influential village head and is decides to marry her. Things dont go as planned, as the village head and his family oppose this. The boys older brother takes this as his responsibility and strives to unite them; even if it requires him to use violent methods. Will he succeed? That forms the crux of the story.
title: Vetrivel
plot: A brother attempts to get his younger brother married to the girl he loves by kidnapping her, but the plan goes so wrong and results in messy situations.

A young boy falls in love with the daughter of an influential village head and is decides to marry her. Things dont go as planned, as the village head and his family oppose this. The boys older brother takes this as his responsibility and strives to unite them; even if it requires him to use violent methods. Will he succeed? That forms the crux of the story.
